org.restlet.component
Interface Component

All Superinterfaces:
Element, UniformInterface
All Known Subinterfaces:
Gateway, OriginServer, Proxy, RestletContainer, RestletServer, UserAgent
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultRestletContainer, DefaultRestletServer
public interface Component
extends Element, UniformInterface

Abstract unit of software instructions and internal state.

"A component is an abstract unit of software instructions and internal state that provides a transformation of data via its interface." Roy T. Fielding

See Also:
Source dissertation
